statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE content_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT behavior_type FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE user_id IN (789, 890);
SELECT user_id, content_id FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'like' ORDER BY user_id, content_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, content_id FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE content_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE content_id = 1 ORDER BY behavior_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_behavior_patterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 5 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT content_id, user_id, recommendation_type FROM content_recommendations WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM content_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 75;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior JOIN content_recommendations ON user_behavior.user_id = content_recommendations.user_id WHERE recommendation_score > 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT user_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_score FROM content_recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'personalized' AND recommendation_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1001 AND behavior_type = 'view' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, COUNT(*) as behavior_count FROM user_behavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING behavior_count > 5 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns
SELECT user_id, username, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorPatterns
SELECT behavior_description, behavior_type, user_id FROM UserBehaviorPatterns
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, username, behavior_description FROM UserBehaviorPatterns
SELECT username, user_id, behavior_description FROM UserBehaviorPatterns
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT behavior_description FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE behavior_type = 'view' AND user_id = 2002
SELECT recommendation_title, recommended_by FROM ContentRecommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'video' ORDER BY recommendation_id LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, preference_category, preference_score FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_score > 0.8
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT title, category FROM content_items WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, content_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, age, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT content_id, title, category FROM content_items WHERE publish_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%click%' AND user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_date, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 4.5 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT title, category FROM content WHERE type = 'movie';
SELECT user_id, content_id, rating FROM user_preferences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.content_id, c.title FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN content c ON p.content_id = c.content_id WHERE u.age < 25 AND c.category = 'Technology';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(r.content_id) AS recommendations_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING recommendations_count > 2 ORDER BY recommendations_count DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.rating, c.title FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN content c ON p.content_id = c.content_id WHERE u.gender = 'Female' AND p.rating >= 4 ORDER BY u.username, p.rating DESC;
